attributes.action: Allow Hayes Year 13s to have a good last day
attributes.additional_details: Every year has had a good, fulfilled last day and the teachers at Hayes school are trying to remove this emotional life experience from us. We must not let them do this!
attributes.background: A Year 13 last day is a tradition that has been around for decades and we have been denied of this privilege. The teachers are trying to do take this special occasion away from us and we feel violated. Help us get to 150 signatures so we can convince our teachers to let us have a proper last day.

rejection.details:
This is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament. 

You could try raising this issue with your headteacher or the board of governors. You should be able to find how to contact the governors on your school website.
